Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if that player has a poison counter, you gain that much life.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, prevent the next {X} damage that would be dealt to you this turn, where X is the number of poison counters that player has.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, you may remove a poison counter from yourself. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever a player gets one or more poison counters, you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control with toxic deals combat damage to a player, you may put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent has three or more poison counters, you may put a shield counter on target creature you control.
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with toxic, that creature’s controller gets a poison counter.
Whenever this creature attacks, if you have fewer poison counters than an opponent, this creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player gets an additional poison counter.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control with toxic dies, each opponent with a poison counter loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Whenever you gain life, you may remove a poison counter from yourself. If you do, proliferate.

Whenever you remove one or more poison counters from yourself, put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
